H0.text: Ladon the dragon was killed by Heracles while guarding which of the twelve labours. The Golden Apples

H1.text: Ladon the dragon was killed by Heracles while guarding which of the twelve labours. The Elysian Fields

H2.text: Ladon the dragon was killed by Heracles while guarding which of the twelve labours. The River Styx

H3.text: Ladon the dragon was killed by Heracles while guarding which of the twelve labours. Hespera

A4.text: The dragon Ladon was sent to guard the golden apples.
